resources.string: Do you have a Twitch or YouTube stream?
Include the keyword \"lidraughts.org\" in your stream title when you stream on Lidraughts.
Remove the keyword when you stream non-Lidraughts stuff.
Lidraughts will detect your stream automatically and enable the following perks:
Benefits of streaming with the keyword
Get a flaming streamer icon on your Lidraughts profile.
Get bumped up the top of the streamers list.
Show your stream in your games, tournaments and studies.
Your stream is being reviewed by moderators.
Please fill in your streamer information, and upload a picture.
When you are ready to be listed as a lidraughts streamer, %s

If your stream is in another language than English, include the correct language tag (%s), enclosed in square brackets, at the start of your stream title. As examples, include "[RU]" for Russian, "[TR]" for Turkish, "[FR]" for French, etc. Put it in the stream title in the Twitch or YouTube page, not in the Lidraughts stream settings. If your stream is in English, there is no need to include a language tag.
Your YouTube channel ID or URL
In one sentence, tell us about your stream
Be safe from ads and trackers infesting Twitch and YouTube. Lidraughts recommends uBlock Origin which is free and open-source.
